input.sentences: the school band starts to perform .
students await their time to walk on stage .
all the parents have their camera pointed at the stage .
[male] graduates . he smiles at the principal
output.sentences: The band starts playing in preparation for graduation.
As the students also prepare the caps and gowns in rightful positions.
These students are excited to be on this final journey.
But not as excited as the proud parents taking pictures left and right.
Capturing every moment to final walk when their graduates receive their dimplomas.
